texto: 4.1 This International Standard is designed to assist top management identify and realize benefits by the application of the management principles. To achieve financial and economic benefits, relevant processes have been identified for each principle, and examples of methods and tools have been provided to assist in the application of the principles. The added value from the expected benefits should reflect the interrelationships between principles, processes and a holistic view of the organization and its interested parties. © ISO 2006 – All rights reserved 1 ISO 10014:2006(E)
